data.title: Flytoget Airport Express Train
data.meta_description: From Oslo Airport to the city centre in 19 minutes
data.text:
Norway's only high-speed train is the fastest, most comfortable and reliable way to get from Oslo Airport (OSL) to the city centre. The trip takes 19 minutes.

Service-minded hosts are available for information and help during the whole journey.

Onboard the train you'll have access to high-speed WI-FI, screens with useful and entertaining information, bathroom facilities and areas for baby strollers.

Flytoget's amazing travel warranty is rarely used. With a punctuality of 96 % the train is almost never late, but if it should happen, the travel warranty makes sure to get you on the next available flight.​​​​​​

Stops and departure times

Lillestrøm: 3 departures per hour (travel time 12 minutes)

Oslo Central Station: 6 departures per hour (19–22 minutes)

Nationaltheatret, Skøyen and Lysaker: 5 departures per hour (25–35 minutes)

Stabekk: 2 departures per hour (36 minutes)

Sandvika, Asker and Drammen: 3 departures per hour (41/47/60 minutes)

More information about stops and departure times

Tickets and discounts

Tickets must be purchased before you board the train – in the Flytoget app, on the Flytoget website, from a ticket machine at the station, or simply by swiping your card in the reader at the station.

To accompany somebody to or from the airport, use Flytogets Kiss and Fly ticket, which allows you to return for free within three hours after purchase.

All children under the age of 16 are free of charge as long as they travel with an adult. Students receive a 50% discount, regardless of age.
